name: Rox
content:
Rox was the name of a pet Skar'kla owned by Yarvok, a leader of the Nova Blades pirates. Yarvok raised Rox himself, just like he did his other two pet Skar'kla, Yug and Wa-Vendeg. Krupo, a beast wrangler, lost Rox along with several of Yarvok's other pets after a ship carrying the pets crashed on the planet Dantooine, angering Yarvok. Yarvok threatened to kill Krupo if his missing pets, including Rox, were not found at once.
Rox was mentioned in the Codex entry for Invasive Species on Dantooine in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare.
